titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Elmer E. White court file

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.scopecontent: Legal brief, 1977, prepared in the case of the Children of the Chippewa, Ottawa and Potawatomy Tribes and Paul J. Johnson, plaintiffs vs. the Regents of The University of Michigan, concerning the claims of these Indians against the University under the provisions of a treaty negotiated in 1817; include plaintiff's exhibits containing historical background of the case; and decision, February 1979, of Judge Edward D. Deake.
